sentences.en: Above the content does not have arbitrarily to reprint without myselfpermission, thanks!
sentences.cn: (以上内容未经本人许可不得擅自转载, 谢谢! )

sentences.en: Arbitrarily imposing sanctions or restrictions will not help solve the problem.
sentences.cn: 那样不仅于事无补,而且会损害两国的利益.

sentences.en: Can arbitrarily assembled into large indoor, outdoor advertising, laser show curtain wall.
sentences.cn: 可任意拼装成大型户内 、 户外电激光广告示幕墙.

sentences.en: His axiom presupposes that there is an arbitrarily large radius at our disposal.
sentences.cn: 他的公理就是先假定有如我们意愿的任意大半径.

sentences.en: Internet offers people the space to construct net name arbitrarily.
sentences.cn: 网络给人们提供了自由、随意构造网名的条件.

sentences.en: It'should be used in a careful and balanced manner, not arbitrarily.
sentences.cn: 这个原则应该根据实际需要适当的运用,不能随便使用, 否则会适得其反.

sentences.en: Its corrupting effects can be diminished to an arbitrarily small degree by the use of redundancy.
sentences.cn: 使用冗余可以使其讹误影响减缩到任意小的程度.

sentences.en: Once it is decided, no change shall be made arbitrarily.
sentences.cn: 但一经确定, 不得随意变动.

sentences.en: Once the aim is fixed, we should not change it arbitrarily.
sentences.cn: 目标一旦确定, 我们就不应该随意改变.

sentences.en: The equipment should be free operation and maintenance, operation and arbitrarily.
sentences.cn: 设备应有专人操作和保养, 他人不得随意操作.

sentences.en: The quotient simply becomes arbitrarily large as h goes to 0.
sentences.cn: 商,当h趋近0时,只是任意增大.

sentences.en: The specificity fallacy arbitrarily limits a conclusion to specific categories of ideas.
sentences.cn: “特异性谬论”任意限制结论中包含某些特定类别的想法.

sentences.en: The victims were not chosen arbitrarily.
sentences.cn: 下手对象不是随便选择的。
我们任意安排一对配偶.

sentences.en: We might arbitrarily assume for each of the three register specifications.
sentences.cn: 对于三个寄存器我们可以随意假定每种寄存器规定的动作.

words.tran_cn: [数] 任意的；武断的；专制的
武断地；反复无常地；专横地
